metadata.name: BattleDrome Bronze Chest
metadata.description:
**BattleDrome Bronze Chests:**

These chests contain a guaranteed 125 FAME Tokens, as well as the following chances win a bonus upon opening:
10% Bonus FAME - 5%
25% Bonus FAME - 2%
50% Bonus FAME - 1%
FREE Warrior NFT - 1%
FREE Region NFT - 0.1%

For more details on how BattleDrome Loot Chests work, please read the description info on the BattleDrome Loot Chests collection, or visit the BattleDrome website.
